snippet.title: Original NESTLÉ® TOLL HOUSE® Chocolate Chip Cookies
snippet.description: This famous classic American cookie is a treat no matter what the age or occasion. Enjoy it with a glass of cold milk.

snippet.title: Quick Hot Cocoa For One
snippet.description: Treat yourself to a big mug of creamy hot chocolate with this quick-as-a-wink recipe. Perfect when the weather is not.
